title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API that lets you pull, create and run Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally on macOS, Linux and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; supports sync/async, streaming, chat, embeddings and custom Modelfiles.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM and chat model with standard LangChain interfaces.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat interface, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint proxy.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, chat, embeddings and custom options.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation history and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant with autocomplete and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit frontend for local docs Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI for Ollama featuring SSR, theming, conversation export and responsive design.

title: ollama-node
summary: Lightweight Node.js wrapper around the Ollama REST API with TypeScript definitions and async iterators.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with serde models and tokio support.

title: ollama-gradle-plugin
summary: Gradle plugin to download and cache Ollama models at build time and spin up test containers for CI.

title: Ollama Reddit Community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, integrations and feature requests around Ollama.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread on Ollama 0.1.30 release featuring multi-modal vision support and updated Mistral 7B v0.2.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module that spins up Ollama as a service container for reproducible LLM pipelines in CI.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial but idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and automatic retries.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.
